column1: #Text=" Ikki says : " Juniper Lightning bug , paws off the table !
#Text=This is going to be a civilized breakfast .
#Text=Daddy always says a blessing before we eat , so ... be quiet and listen up !
#Text=We are thankful for this super yummy food and for being the best - est new friends in the world .
#Text=But we are most thankful because Meelo and Jinora are n't here , because they stink .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Actually , is there room for one more ?
#Text=You can sit next to Blueberry Spicehead .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Nice to meet you , Blueberry Spicehead .
#Text=" Ikki says : " And that 's Princess Rainbow , and that 's Twinkle Starchild , and that 's Juniper Lightning Bug .
#Text=Can they be my new brothers and sisters too ?
#Text=" Ikki says : " Maybe , but only if they say it 's okay .
#Text=" Bolin says : " We 're good to go .
#Text=I gave all the money to some guys over there .
#Text=I told them to " take care of it " , and then I winked .
